about_the_game:
LET'S GET FREAKO!

They’re small, they’re mischievous, and they love to party. For centuries, these fun-loving critters known as FREAKOS have lived in peace and harmony on their home planet of FREAK WORLD.

Sadly, this time of tranquility came to an end when a ruthless Freako named MUNCH appointed himself FREAK LORD of the entire planet, overthrowing his fellow Freakos with a vast army of mechanical FREAKO KILLERS.

Once he seized control, Freaklord President Munch set to work enslaving his fellow Freakos. He forced them to toil day and night, operating a vast network of PHONE HOTLINES, and in turn increasing the profits of MUNCH INDUSTRIES by 10,000%.

But, there were 3 Freakos in particular who fought against the power of Munch. Each possessing a special set of skills...

ARE YOU READY TO PARTY?!

- Play as FRANKIE, BOINK and DOTTIE, run and jump through the treacherous apocalyptic cityscape of Freak World and scale Munch Tower to steal the secrets to Munch's Freak Phone technology.

- Take on an army of robotic Freako Killers.

- A prequel to the movie Frankie Freako.

FRANKIE FREAKO is a challenging 8-bit style retro side-scrolling platform game based on the movie of the same name, designed to replicate the feel of movie adaptations of the 80s!

name: Frankie Freako

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
